changes: Implemented TemplateService class with multiple methods

patterns_discovered: Service class with dependency on JSON seed file
Filtering methods with multiple criteria (VRAM, category, verification)
Type hinting with Optional and List types
Error handling for file loading and JSON parsing
gotchas_discovered: Hardcoded path determination for default seed file
No persistent storage, templates loaded from JSON on initialization
Potential performance issue with iterating through all templates for some methods
recommendations: Consider using a database or more scalable storage mechanism
Add caching for expensive filtering operations
Implement logging for file loading and parsing errors
Add type validation for seed file contents
Consider making seed file path configurable via environment variable
